item.description:
Dr. Thom Bober
Presented by Waltham Raw New England Community Dinner/Speaker Series

5:30 PM DVD One Woman's Story by Dorothy Torrey
6-7 PM Raw Pot Luck Dinner

Dr. Thom Bober will discuss the changing landscape of environmental toxicity, its affect on a variety of conditions, and the natural solutions that exist within plants to combat this growing concern.

This event will be at the U Mass Waltham Center, 240 Beaver Street, Waltham, MA 02452. For directions, call (781) 891-0650 x 56. Fee: $ 5 for members (annual membership is $25) or $10 for non-members. Checks are payable to "Waltham Raw New England Community". Mail to Lisa Hart, 21 Williams Rd, N. Reading, MA 01864 (questions, hart.lisa@gmail.com, 978-390-5976). Bring a raw, organic, unprocessed, non-animal based ready- to-serve dish for 6 - 8 people with recipe and serving utensils. Check www.rawnewenglandcommunity.com for recipes & more.

To RSVP, please use BOTH the Meetup system AND call Betsy Bragg, Health Educator & Coach, at 781-899-6664, (cell) 617-835-2913 or email Betsy@rawnewenglandcommunity.com (specify which event). If you only use the Meetup RSVP system, then you won't be registered. If you only contact Betsy and don't use Meetup, your Meetup member stats and our group's Meetup stats won't be correct. Thank you for understanding.

Raw Pot-luck: all those attending are requested to bring a raw, organic, unprocessed, non-animal based (vegan with no honey) ready- to-serve dish for 6 - 8 people. Please bring serving utensils labeled with your name on them. Bring a typed or neatly printed recipe to display next to your dish. For recipe ideas, go to http://www.rawnewengl... .

--------------

rawfood.meetup.com/343/files

To promote BRFM, please print, cut & hand out these strips of paper:
files.meetup.com/733136/BostonRawFoodMeetup-MemDrive12Up.doc

rawfood.meetup.com/343/calendar

For more information, please check the message board:
rawfood.meetup.com/343/messages/boards

For other raw events around New England
www.RawNewEnglandCommunity.com


Posted by Daryl
item.name: Dr. Thom Bober at Waltham Raw New England Speaker Series
